handist.collections.glb

Class DistColGlbTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • handist.collections.glb.DistColGlbTask

  • public class DistColGlbTask
extends Object
    Implementation of GlbTask for the DistChunkedList distributed collection. This implementation relies on LongRange to describe assignments taken up by workers.
    Author:
    Patrick Finnerty
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • answerLifeline

        public boolean answerLifeline(handist.collections.glb.GlbComputer.LifelineToken token)
        Asks the GlbTask to answer a lifeline thief. The asynchronous call which effectively answers the remote thief is made inside this method. After which the counters for the local completion of the task are updated. This is necessary since we cannot make an answer with an asynchronous call registered under Finish instances which have completed locally without compromising the termination mechanism.
        Parameters:
        token - token containing the information about the thief
        Returns:
        true if an answer to the remote thief was made, false if it was impossible to make such an answer at the time this method was called

      • assignWorkToWorker

        public handist.collections.glb.Assignment assignWorkToWorker()
        Assigns some work, i.e. a portion of the underlying collection which needs to undergo an operation to the asking worker
        Returns:
        an assignment which the worker will process, or null if impossible to assign some work at the time this method was called

      • mergeAssignments

        public void mergeAssignments(HashMap<handist.collections.glb.GlbOperation,Integer> quantities,
                             ArrayList<handist.collections.glb.Assignment> assignments)
        Merges the given assignments into this GlbTask. This method is called by a lifeline answer after the instances on which the assignment operate have been integrated into the underlying DistChunkedList.
        Parameters:
        quantities - the number of assignment which have work for each glb operation entered as a key in this map
        assignments - the assignments that were stolen

      • newOperation

        public boolean newOperation(handist.collections.glb.GlbOperation op)
        Initializes the progress tracking in every assignment contained in this local instance for the provided operation.

        This method acquires the "WriteLock" of this instance to be protected against calls to

        • assignWorkToWorker()
        • DistColAssignment method used to split assignment
        Parameters:
        op - the new operation available for processing
        Returns:
        true if some new work is available on the local host as a result of this new operation. A case where this method would return false is if there were no elements in the local handle of DistChunkedList.
